# SSH fingerprint using DNS

## Example

```
SSH check: shulgin.xor-gate.org:6222 85.146.17.235:6222 &{{0xc420060200} 105829627038171506151759493932594306759368077135731755059908617643419229621707 111074019450348674543579735720248005360244794714865296956022316300327533834945}
lookup shulgin.xor-gate.org tcp://shulgin.xor-gate.org:6222
SSH pubkey SHA256: [172 132 51 8 55 128 192 213 141 153 67 164 87 145 42 85 47 46 128 206 158 198 12 168 235 198 118 195 8 174 48 211]
DNS:
shulgin.xor-gate.org.	86400	IN	SSHFP	3 2 AC8433083780C0D58D9943A457912A552F2E80CE9EC60CA8EBC676C308AE30D3
raw [172 132 51 8 55 128 192 213 141 153 67 164 87 145 42 85 47 46 128 206 158 198 12 168 235 198 118 195 8 174 48 211]
shulgin.xor-gate.org.	86400	IN	SSHFP	3 1 5F64FCE827AF9CAF192ACCDCBD01517A16B16A04
raw [95 100 252 232 39 175 156 175 25 42 204 220 189 1 81 122 22 177 106 4]
```
